price: 89. Iskase saamax (marakan) oo dheh: Nabadgelyo,wayse ogaan (waxa ku dhaca).
arabic: فَٱصۡفَحۡ عَنۡهُمۡ وَقُلۡ سَلَٰمٞۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'faḥ ʿanhum waqul salāmun fasawfa yaʿlamūna
